We were here on our way back to Kandy after visiting Sigiryia. The staff was really friendly and the food prepared in the moment we ordered (no premade stuff). Probably the only place we asked for "NO SPICE" and it actually came without spice (thanks!...haha). The place itself is very clean and looking new. They also have super happy dogs (at least 4) in the garden that they take care of - contrary to many places in Sri Lanka where dogs are shoved away in very bad ways. And don't worry, they will not bother you or enter the restaurant - they respect the boundaries very well! 
Thanks for this meal with a great vibe <3
